name: Monk Fishing
description:
It's time to fish the only way you know how. With. Your. Fist.

Your friends have been captured by menacing fish. Punch your way across the water to save them. However, make sure you act fast because you fall into the water when your KI runs out! If you fall in, don't worry. You can reel yourself back to the raft and show the fish that perseverance is deadlier than a fist. But just barely.

This is a short jam game and might have more development in the future!
